item.title: [Game Boy Advance] Discrete Orange
item.description: Discrete Orange Discrete Orange is a homebrew game, for the Game Boy Advance. It’s a turn-based puzzle-platformer, with discrete movement. Trailer : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9QHEMXD5rdA More info & Download : https://tardigrade-nx.itch.io/discrete-orange
